price: 66 Qu’attendent-ils sinon que l’Heure vienne les surprendre sans qu’ils s’y attendent ?
arabic: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hal yanẓurūna illā al-sāʿata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
